<<<<<<< HEAD
A discourse concerning the authority, stile, and perfection of the books of the Old and New-Testament with a continued illustration of several difficult texts of scripture throughout the whole work / by John Edwards. Edwards, John, 1637-1716.
[16], 430, [1] p.
Printed and sold by Richard Wilkin at the King's-Head in St. Paul's Church-Yard, London : MDCXCIII [1693].
Vol. 2 (E202A) and vol.3 (E202B) also appear at reel positions 2389:2b-c. Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York. Bound with E202A and E202B following, which are vols. 2-3 of E202aA.
=======
